channel.title: Deep Learning on Corentin LEGER
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Corentin LEGER

item.title: Alzheimer disease detection by 3D MRI analysis
item.description: This project focuses on medical imaging and computer vision. The goal is to develop a machine learning model able to detect the state of development of the Alzheimer disease, using 3D MRI data from patients. In order to do so, we tried different approaches, including the ‘2D epsilon’ method, which is the use of 2D Convolutionnal neural networks on 2D slices of the MRI, and also the direct use of 3D CNN.
